```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(include = TRUE)
```

```{r libraries, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(agricolae)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)
library(MASS)
library(dplyr)
library(dunn.test)
library(corrplot)
```

```{r import data}
plant.metrics <- read_excel("raw_files/plant_biometric_parameters.xlsx")
```

```{r}
plant.response <- plant.metrics[,-c(1,2)]
cor.matrix <- plant.response %>% cor()

cor.mat.test <- cor.mtest(cor.matrix)

corrplot(cor.matrix, p.mat=cor.mat.test$p, sig.level = 0.05, order= "hclust", type= "upper", method= "number", insig = "pch", pch=4,number.cex = 0.75)
```
